titleStmt.title: By the Mayor. Whereas by an ancient law and statute of this realm, it is provided, that no fairs or markets be kept in church-yards ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.
Frederick, John, Sir, fl. 1661-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Flesher, Printer to the honourable city of London,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Place and date of publication suggested by text.
Dated at end: Given at Guild-hall London, the 22 day of November, in the said thirteenth year of his Majesties reign.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
